alert.note: Alert for Eastern Louisa; Western Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:17PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Louisa County through 600 PM EDT... At 516 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Boswells Tavern, or 8 miles northwest of Louisa, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Louisa, Mineral, Boswells Tavern, Pendleton, Louisa Airport, Green Springs, Cuckoo, Yanceyville, Fredericks Hall, Waldrop, Byrd Mill, Trevilians, Wares Crossroads, Vawter Corner and Apple Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
